Container.Name: ddns-route53
Container.Overview: Dynamic DNS for Amazon Route 53‎ on a time-based schedule [br] Create yml file in /mnt/user/appdata/ddns-route53.yml before hand https://github.com/crazy-max/ddns-route53/blob/master/doc/configuration.md[/br]
Container.Description: Dynamic DNS for Amazon Route 53‎ on a time-based schedule [br] Create yml file in /mnt/user/appdata/ddns-route53.yml before hand https://github.com/crazy-max/ddns-route53/blob/master/doc/configuration.md[/br]

Config.Name: SCHEDULE
Config.Description: CRON expression to schedule ddns-route53 - http://www.cronmaker.com

Config.Name: MAX_RETRIES
Config.Description: Number of retries in case of WAN IP retrieval failure
